original_text: So Samuel took a baby lamb. He gave it as a whole burnt offering to the Lord. Samuel asked the Lord to help the Israelites. The Lord answered his prayer in this way:
korean_text: 사무엘이 젖 먹는 어린 양 하나를 가져다가 온전한 번제를 여호와께 드리고 이스라엘을 위하여 여호와께 부르짖으매 여호와께서 응답하셨더라

sentences.original_text: So Samuel took a baby lamb.
He gave it as a whole burnt offering to the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 온전한 번제물로 주님께 드렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: Samuel asked the Lord to help the Israelites.
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘은 이스라엘 백성을 도와달라고 주님께 기도했습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord answered his prayer in this way:
